name: Cube Sacrifice
description:
You play as one of the race of slime cubes. You have the opportunity to save them from a terrible disease, will you be able to do it?

Sacrifice a few to save others.

  • WASD - To Move;
  • RMB - Activate Shield;
  • LMB - Fire;
  • Q - Skill Panel;

Created by:

  • Dmitrii Malinkin
  • Anton Pokidov
